section.title: The Assign GL Account help screen
section.para: The chart of accounts for the default organisation is built up by selecting or 'assigning' accounts that you want to use from the global chart of accounts master template. This means that if you want to create a new account then it needs to be created in the global chart of accounts before it can be assigned to be used.

section.title: How do I assign a GL account?

listitem.para: Click on the 'Assign GL Account' tab
Use the drop down box to select the 'GL Account Id' to required
Use the drop down box to select the 'Party Id' to assign the GL Account to (NOTE: Only parties that have been setup under 'Organization GL Settings' will be displayed)

section.para: NOTE: All assignments for a party can be viewed under 'Organization GL Settings / Setup / Chart of Accounts' for the party required.
